summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Valentine's Y2K themed webpage. Found 2 functional bugs affecting countdown navigation and YES button interaction, but overall app works well with excellent design implementation.

ui_bugs.issue: Countdown numbers not updating properly - always displays '10' instead of counting down from 10 to 1
ui_bugs.impact: Users can't see proper countdown progression through slides

ui_bugs.issue: YES button has animation stability issues preventing normal clicks - requires JavaScript click workaround
ui_bugs.impact: Users may have difficulty clicking YES button due to shake animation

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Y2K aesthetic and star field background
Heart clicking interaction works (20 clicks to unlock button)
Progress bar updates correctly with each heart click
Enter button appears after 20 clicks and navigates to countdown
Countdown page loads with retro window styling
Navigation buttons (prev/next) are present and clickable
Proposal page loads with correct question text
NO button runs away when user hovers over it
YES button works via JavaScript click (workaround)
Y2K pink retro aesthetic maintained throughout all pages
Marquee displays at bottom with Valentine's message

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Core functionality works but 2 specific bugs affect user experience

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix countdown number display bug in CountdownPage.js (numbers not updating during navigation) and resolve YES button animation stability issue in ProposalPage.js to allow normal clicking
